程序包 com.maxeye.einksdk.YModem

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    FileStreamThread.DataRaderListener  
    TimeOutHelper.ITimeOut  
    YModemListener
    Listener of the transmission process
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CRC16
    Uses table for irreducible polynomial: 1 + x^2 + x^15 + x^16
    FileStreamThread
    Thread for reading input Stream and encapsulating into a ymodem package Created by leonxtp on 2017/9/16.
    InputStreamSource
    Get InputStream from different source, files from sd card/assets supported.
    L  
    TimeOutHelper
    A timer util for counting the time past after we sent a package to the terminal Created by leonxtp on 2017/9/17.
    YModem
    THE YMODEM: *SENDER: ANDROID APP *------------------------------------------* RECEIVER: BLE DEVICE* HELLO BOOTLOADER ---------------------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* C SOH 00 FF filename0fileSizeInByte0MD5[90] ZERO[38] CRC CRC----->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK C STX 01 FE data[1024] CRC CRC ---------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK STX 02 FF data[1024] CRC CRC ---------------------------------->* <---------------------------------------------------------------* ACK ... ...
    YModem.Builder  
    YModemUtil
    Util for encapsulating data package of ymodem protocol Created by leonxtp on 2017/9/16.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    SourceScheme
    Thanks to Universal-Image-Loader: https://github.com/nostra13/Android-Universal-Image-Loader/blob/master/library/src/main/java/com/nostra13/universalimageloader/core/download/ImageDownloader.java
